item.title: Rename a part of filename of a bunch of files
item.description: Example $ ls -l AndroidTest.pdf Angular2Test.pdf BashTest.pdf The simplest way to remove ‘Test’ from any files: rename 's/Test//g' *.pdf $ ls -l Android.pdf Angular2.pdf Bash.pdf Or change ‘Test’ to ‘Hello’ rename 's/Test/Hello/g' *.pdf $ ls -l AndroidTest.pdf Angular2Test.pdf BashTest.pdf
